title: Enhancing Programming Practical Skills: Implementation and Evaluation of Emergency Remote Teaching (ERT): Mobile Microphone-Based Solutions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and understanding of job-related terminology
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can develop educational scenarios applying Emergency Remote Teaching (ERT) design principles (simplicity, flexibility, empathy) with over 80% accuracy using 15-minute microlearning modules in mobile environments.
Learners complete one ERT content prototype applicable to real corporate environments through project-based assessment and improve it based on peer feedback.
Learners can suggest three or more offline alternative learning strategies (audio lectures, downloadable materials) considering internet accessibility limitations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
